title.value: Биологическая эффективность препарата бактосол против глубневых гнилей картофеля при хранении
Biological efficiency of a preparation bactosol against potato tubers rot during storage

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Kolomiets, Eh.I., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Institute of Microbiology
Busko, I.I., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Potato, Vegetable and Fruit Growing (Belarus). Institute for Fruit Growing
Ananieva, I.N., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Institute of Microbiology
Abakshonok, V.S., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Potato, Vegetable and Fruit Growing (Belarus). Institute for Fruit Growing

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on the results of studies on biological efficiency of a new national microbial preparation Bactosol against potato (Solanum tuberosum) rots in the course of storage life. It was shown that Bactosol treatment of tubers prior to winter conservation ensured control of dry fusarial rot and anthracnose by 54-57% and 58-64%, respectively, as compared to chemical analog efficiency values of 80 and 81.8%.
